first_para: Steven John Webb PC (born 18 July 1965) is a British Liberal Democrat politician who is a former Member of Parliament (MP) and current parliamentary candidate for Thornbury & Yate. He is currently the Minister of State for Pensions.

full.extract: Steven John Webb PC (born 18 July 1965) is a British Liberal Democrat politician who is a former Member of Parliament (MP) and current parliamentary candidate for Thornbury & Yate. He is currently the Minister of State for Pensions.
full.title: Steve Webb
